title: Unjustified censorship
text:
Not a safe place for small businesses. Absolute censorship without recourse if they decide you break rules, even if you aren’t actually breaking rules. I’m a professional bladesmith, and myself along with every other knife maker is fully restricted for weapons violations even tho every adult human on earth uses a knife daily. My current 3 flagged posts are all chef knives, and if I delete those posts, they will flag 3 more until my content is gone. 
The worst part is even tho I’m restricted, I see unsolicited nudity, death, and crime constantly on other accounts that I do not follow. When I report those the reply is always “we understand your concerns but the content is not breaking any rules “ 

Do not try to grow your business here. Avoid reckless censorship and go to X
